title: The P. Craig Russell Library of Opera Adaptations: Vol. 3: Adaptions of Pelleas & Melisande, Salome, Ein Heldentraum, Cavalleria Rusticana
description: This collection of Russell’s classic adaptations concludes with Pelleas & Melisande by Maeterlinck and Debussy, Salome by Richard Strauss and the all new The Godfather’s Code from Cavalleria Rusticana by Mascagni.
author: P. Craig Russell
